title: Jessika Power spruiks sex toys on social media
text:
She's become one of Australia's most successful Instagram influencers since shooting to fame on Married At First Sight.

And on Thursday, Jessika Power was hard at work promoting sex toys to her 215,000 of followers.

In a revealing post, the 28-year-old posed with three hot pink vibrators from the adult pleasure brand, Vush.

Third time lucky? Married At First Sight's Jessika Power posed with three vibrators in a sponsored Instagram post on Thursday

Jessika has previously revealed that she owns four of the sex toys and often promotes them to her fans.

The popular sex toy is billed as a 'vacuum sucker' that uses 'enhanced vacuum technology to gently suck and caress' the female anatomy.

The blonde beauty, who infamously cheated on her MAFS 'husband' with another groom, recently told Daily Mail Australia she is now making between $8,000 and $10,000 per week as a social media influencer.

Money maker: The blonde beauty recently told Daily Mail Australia she is now making between $8,000 and $10,000 per week as a social media influencer

While her weekly income can vary, Jessika has a regular stream of clients willing to pay her thousands just to share a post or video with her 215,000 followers.

In recent months, she has promoted everything from teeth whitening devices and detox teas to skincare products, restaurants and cosmetic clinics.

In addition to this, Jessika has also started doing personal appearances at events, where she can make several thousand dollars for just a few hours of work.

In demand: In recent months, she has promoted everything from teeth whitening devices and detox teas to skincare products, restaurants and cosmetic clinics

In November, the reality star will attend the annual school leavers' 'Schoolies' celebration on the Gold Coast alongside Geordie Shore star Scotty T.

Earlier this month, she flew to Cairns to host several 'Mad Monday' events, where excited locals flocked to take selfies with her.

Despite her steady income from social media, Jessika said she wants to 'focus more on a career away from Instagram and [find a] permanent job.'
description: She's become one of Australia's most successful Instagram influencers since shooting to fame on Married At First Sight.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
